turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, yes, I would like to order a coffee from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you want to order from the Starbucks nearest to your location? The one located at The florence Target?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to here a selection of menu options for coffees available?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: To begin Starbucks coffees are available in in hot and iced varieties, would you like to hear the selections for hot, iced or both?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot only please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks coffees begin with a espresso base and have a selection of added creamers. Americano has hot water, The Latte has steamed milk, the mocha has steamed milk and mocha sauce, the cappuccino has foamed milk, and the Macchiato has foamed milk and either vanilla syrup with caramel sauce or Cinnamon Dolce with cinnamon Dolce syrup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have the Cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many shots of espresso would you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any additional toppings, such as whipped cream, or sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, two sugars and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like to order? Starbucks offers 4 sizes the short small is 8 oz , the tall medium is 12oz, the grande large is 16oz, and Venti extra large is 20oz?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, that is a Venti or large two shot cappuccino with two sugars and whipped cream on top. Would you like to place any additional orders?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like to place this order using the account information stored with Starbucks? Payment will be made using your credit card ending in xxxx.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed a confirmation number and receipt have been sent to your email address. Would you like to place any other orders?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's all. Thank You

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome thank you for ordering.
